TopicTitle: Space X Ships Including (Off Course Ilove You Drone), (Landing Pad)

Articles.Content: Is There A Mod For Space X Ship If not Make one pls
Well, I commend you of the name! How very Karbala! “Off Course I Still Love You!” - Could the other one be “Just Read The Contract”?
Probably still a ways off from seeing any parts mods I'd guess.

2 hours ago, SydKhaos said:

Probably still a ways off from seeing any parts mods I'd guess.

I wouldn't say so, several people on the modding Discord have them working, and the process has been documented. Now it's just up to the mod devs to do something with it, which I assume isn't going to take long.
They provided a launch point in the water, but right now floating physics are really bad (it's the Kraken's habitat). We can't really make ships

On 3/11/2023 at 11:37 PM, munix said:

I wouldn't say so, several people on the modding Discord have them working, and the process has been documented. Now it's just up to the mod devs to do something with it, which I assume isn't going to take long.

Part modding support is still not great. Even with the third party mod loaders, any info on shaders, part modules etc are missing. I hope IG will release their part modding support sometime this summer. I wouldn’t get my hopes of good part mods anytime soon
